name: Walking in Sintra | Photography Workshop Tour
description: One day tour sur Sintra main points of interest and its surroundings framing  city, village, castles, woods and beach landscapes observing 19th-century Romantic architectural monuments references of European influence on territory and Portuguese culture part of  UNESCO World classified heritage.  The triip  includes transportation in between points to visit and group pick Up and Out from one point; And it does not include food and drinks,tickets to venues entrance, if desirable and personal expenses.
